conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway: walls extruded with thickness, multiple faces visible, and an elevated angled view exposing interior volumes.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D wall geometry with clear floor/wall separation and a clean cutaway; minor simplifications in some wall-top/edge detailing.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall room layout matches the 2D plan (living/dining/kitchen at top, bedrooms bottom-left and bottom-right, bath near center-bottom). Some openings/partition placements appear simplified or slightly shifted compared to the exact 2D door/window locations.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture and fixtures are present and generally placed in correct rooms (sofas + dining table in living area, beds in bedrooms, kitchen counters, bathroom fixtures). Minor scale/orientation simplifications.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean presentation on plain background with readable geometry; lighting is neutral and does not obscure the layout. Materials are consistent with no obvious mesh breakage.

detected_errors.description: Some door/window openings appear simplified and may not match the exact wall positions/orientations from the 2D plan.
A few internal partitions/closet details appear less exact than the 2D plan (minor shifts/simplification of small wall segments).

summary: A clear, true 3D cutaway conversion with largely faithful room layout and furnishing, with minor-to-moderate simplifications in smaller partitions and some openings.
